member.name: NMHDDISPINFOA
member.summary: Contains information used in handling HDN_GETDISPINFO notification codes.

member.name: NMHDDISPINFOA.hdr
member.summary: structure containing information about this notification code.

member.name: NMHDDISPINFOA.iItem
member.summary: The zero-based index of the item in the header control.

summary.para: A set of bit flags specifying which members of the structure must be filled in by the owner of the header control. This value can be a combination of the following values:

listheader.description: The pszText field must be filled in.
Version 4.70. TheiImage field must be filled in.
The lParam field must be filled in.
Version 4.70. A return value. Indicates that the header control should store the item information and not ask for it again.

member.name: NMHDDISPINFOA.pszText
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated string containing the text that will be displayed for the header item.

member.name: NMHDDISPINFOA.cchTextMax
member.summary: The size of the buffer thatpszText points to.

member.name: NMHDDISPINFOA.iImage
member.summary: The zero-based index of an image within the image list. The specified image will be displayed with the header item, but it does not take the place of the item's bitmap. IfiImage is set to I_IMAGECALLBACK, the control requests image information for this item by using an HDN_GETDISPINFO notification code.

member.name: NMHDDISPINFOA.lParam
member.summary: An application-defined value to associate with the item.
